body_content.explanation: an old and experienced politician, soldier, or athlete, especially one who is still active:
examples: Manchester City's old warhorse, still fighting fit at 36, was sent off for fouling after half an hour.

body_content.explanation: a piece of music, television show, play, or other performed piece of work that has often been performed or shown and is very famous:
examples: I don't understand why a ballet company can't perform fresh new material instead of just bringing out the same old warhorses year after year.
